paragraphs: Trapped with old technology powering his old portfolio Inu Chivu wanted a new website with a modern dashboard and a minimalist look.
We have created a special Wordpress backend for easy photography publishing. And a clean design which stays out of the viewer's way and is enjoyable even on small screens.
It comes in two flawors: black and white to offer high contrast background for photos.
